org.jamsim.ascape.r
Class RFileInterface

java.lang.Object
  org.jamsim.ascape.r.RFileInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
PanelViewListener, org.omancode.util.swing.MRUFiles.Processor
public final class RFileInterface
extends Object
implements PanelViewListener, org.omancode.util.swing.MRUFiles.Processor

Handles the opening, display, execution and saving of R files in the GUI. Creates JEditPanelViews that contain the contents of R files. Supplies menu options and keyboard shortcut keys for opening, executing and saving R files.

Version:
$Revision: 64
Author:
Oliver Mannion

getInstance

public static RFileInterface getInstance(Scape scape,
                                         ScapeRInterface scapeR,
                                         FileLoader fileloader)
                                  throws IOException
Return the singleton instance. The first time this is called the instance will be created using the supplied parameters.

Parameters:
scape - scape to add JEditPanelViews as a listener to.
scapeR - scape R
fileloader - file loader
Returns:
an RFileInterface singleton instance.
Throws:
IOException - if problem reading MRU files from prefs

panelViewClosing

public int panelViewClosing(PanelView pv)
When closed, checks the buffer's dirty status and prompts the user to save.

Specified by:
panelViewClosing in interface PanelViewListener
Parameters:
pv - panel view
Returns:
JInternalFrame.DO_NOTHING_ON_CLOSE if panel is to be left open. JInternalFrame.DISPOSE_ON_CLOSE if panel is to be closed.
